name: Last Stand (Michael Michael Studios)
description:
Description:

This is just a simple survival game I made for a game jam. You play as a cube on a island and you goal is to last as long as possible by upgrading your stats and killing as many cubes as possible. Be careful however, you are maxed at level 20 so use your stats wisely!

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

Left click - Shoot
